mapper.select: select lesson_id as no, titl as title, sdt as startDate, edt as endDate, tot_hr as totalHours from lms_lesson order by sdt desc
select titl as title, sdt as startDate, edt as endDate, tot_hr as totalHours from lms_lesson where lesson_id=#{no}
mapper.update: update lms_lesson set titl=#{title}, conts=#{contents}, sdt=#{startDate}, edt=#{endDate}, tot_hr=#{totalHours}, day_hr=#{dayHours} where lesson_id=#{no}"
